channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Beau Brummel Murder
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Ray Cummings)
item.description: George Bryan didn't mind being called "Fashion Plate" by the villagers. That was fine. It would fit right in with his plans, for who would suspect the dandified fog he appeared to be of cold blooded murder?
